WRITING.TITLE: Sometimes do third party sellers not update the shipping status?
WRITING.TEXT: I have had problems with an order, seller wont contact me back at all and it says my item has been preparing for shipment for a week and a half. Amazon filed an a - z claim and just today apparently the claim was denied after it was already approved a couple days ago. The seller has now blocked me from sending messages. Not sure what to do here?

These yellow triangles did not show up for at least 30 minutes to an hour after 12:00 am when the swagoboard was made available. Whoever completed the squares before these triangles appeared got screwed over cause the spins weren't even available on the squares yet.

Well for some reason it took a while for the little triangle tabs to show up, showing how much spins you get for each square. So I am assuming since they didnt show up right away and I completed them I got screwed over and so did everyone else that completed them before the little orange triangles showed up.
Mine have lit up right away and are completed I just haven't received my spins yet

No that is only to receive the Swagbucks, you just have to complete the square to get whatever spin(s) it says on each square. I have not received any for the squares I completed and that was 2 and a half hours ago.

WRITING.TITLE: Still not receiving spins from complete squares on swago board?
WRITING.TEXT: I was wondering if anyone new what was going on with this situation? I completed quite a few square on my swago board but the little corner tabs on the squares didnt show up till 12:30 or 1:00 am, I didnt receive any of my spins. I completed a square just now at 3:00 am and received a spin but that makes me mad cause I should have been credited at least 14 or 15 now and it was because the little tabs showing the number of spins you get for completing the square didnt show up for an hour after they made the swagoboard available to complete at 12:00 am
Don't worry about it, a lot of people aren't even earning spins for the spin and win, I completed 13 and haven't received any spins at all, quite disappointing '
Same here I completed a bunch of squares and nothing, I was wondering if you were rewarded them after you submitted the board or before?
Awesome thats all I wanted to know, thanks for taking the time to respond to all of my questions
What happens if the Third party seller doesnt ever cancel the order? Will amazon cancel it for them and give me my money back?
I dont know what to do it just says it was removed doesnt say pending or anything. The seller wont answer at all so I dont even know how to cancel my order. Its said preparing for shipment for days.
If it says Gift card ammount: -CDN$ 10.00 does that mean the refund was issued?

WRITING.TITLE: Third party seller never shipped my item, am I getting a refund from amazon?
WRITING.TEXT:
I ordered a Dvd off of a third party seller and they never returned my message or shipped my dvd so amazon filed an a to z claim. I just received this email from amazon, but I used a gift card for my purchase does this still mean I am getting a refund?
We are writing to let you know that shipment of the following order has not been confirmed by the seller within the expected timeframe:
ORDER DETAILS
Order ID: 701-1263924-4393843 Merchant name: neoiyouwe Item(s) to ship: Name: Blade Runner: The Director's Cut (Widescreen) Qty: 1 ASIN/ISBN: 0790729628
Because shipment of this order has not yet been confirmed by the seller, your credit card has not been charged and we are not able to provide you with shipment details.
If you would like to ask neoiyouwe for more information about the status of this order, including the expected ship date, you may contact them directly.
Thanks for shopping on Amazon.ca.
Alright, thanks for the help and feedback.

Thanks for taking the time to reply. I was just concerned cause I checked a review and a whole bunch of people were giving it 1 star for 54 reviews in total and complaining that they would show up late or not at all. https://ca.trustpilot.com/review/asendia.com

Bought a dvd from a third party seller that I would not recommend "Better World Books" . They sent my package with "Asendia" and I have been reading the company is horrible, sometimes people dont even receive their stuff and Asendia doesnt answer to your emails. I was wondering if anyone has received stuff via Asendia and if it is safe? I emailed the third party seller "Better world Books" and they just keep saying the same thing. This is what they keep saying:
Hello,
Thank you for your email. International orders are shipped from the United States via Brokers Worldwide who then delivers your order to your local postal carrier for final delivery. The entire process takes 10-21 business days to arrive. As of today, it has been 1 business days. I'm afraid that we are unable to provide tracking on international shipments.
If you have any additional questions in the meantime, please be sure to let us know.
Sincerely,
Jennifer

WRITING.TITLE: Need help with shipping problem
WRITING.TEXT: [removed]

WRITING.TITLE: Asendia? Need help
WRITING.TEXT:
Bought a dvd from a third party seller that I would not recommend "Better World Books" . They sent my package with "Asendia" and I have been reading the company is horrible sometimes people dont even receive their stuff and Asendia doesnt answer to your emails.I was wondering if anyone has received stuff via Asendia and if it is safe? I emailed the third party seller "Better world Books" and they just keep saying the same thing. This is what they keep saying:
Hello,
Thank you for your email. International orders are shipped from the United States via Brokers Worldwide who then delivers your order to your local postal carrier for final delivery. The entire process takes 10-21 business days to arrive. As of today, it has been 1 business days. I'm afraid that we are unable to provide tracking on international shipments.
If you have any additional questions in the meantime, please be sure to let us know.
Sincerely,
Jennifer
They should have kept the preview to them selves!
That licks pouch.

WRITING.TITLE: Stoked to find out there was a swago board to fill, apparently it has ended?
WRITING.TEXT: I have been gone to a friends house for a couple hours and when I came on swagbucks when I got back home there was a swago board to fill. When I clicked on it it said it had already ended, has it already ended or has it not even started yet?
It was paid shipping, I dont have prime. And they shipped it with Purolater I am choked.

If you do the the normal playlists, right click tab that has the video playlist playing and mute tab. Then drag the tab off so it is a new window but keep your first browser window open. You should be able to leave them while they play and do what you want in the mean time. Thats what I do. The nCrave ones are different they require you to stay on the page. Some of them used to allow you to leave them unattended.
I don't understand how it was canceled when it was available for purchase and I have played it. What do you mean?
Awesome, I really wish they made Ratchet and clank, jak and daxter, and sly cooper for xbox. Good times
So when I put a xbox game in my xbox 360 it will automatically download you are saying?

WRITING.TITLE: How does the backwards compatible games work for xbox games on xbox 360?
WRITING.TEXT: I was reading a list of the compatible xbox games with xbox 360 and I wanted to buy a few like Max Payne, Spider Man, Fable, Lord of the rings but it said something about having a emulator? I was just wonderind do the xbox games run on xbox 360 without an emulator or do I have to have one? Can I download one off of xbox live?

WRITING.TITLE: How does the backwards compatible games work for xbox games on xbox 360?
WRITING.TEXT: I was reading a list of the compatible xbox games with xbox 360 and I wanted to buy a few like Max Payne, Spider Man, Red dead revolver, Fable, Lord of the rings but it said something about having a emulator? I was just wonderind do the xbox games run on xbox 360 without an emulator or do I have to have one? Can I download one off of xbox live?

I have no clue, I was guessing they didnt have any left in stock but it says the dvd is in stock so I dunno what the deal was. This is what they said:
I'm very sorry about the delay in sending your order. While looking into this, I found a problem that was preventing your order from shipping. This is corrected now, and your order will be shipping soon.
To make up for the inconv,ience ,I've refunded the CDN$ 4.98 shipping charge for your order to your original payment method.
Well at least I was refunded 5 bucks for the shipping

I am not a prime member, I ordered the dvd this last saturday and I messaged them today to ask why it wasnt shipped today, and there was a complication and now it says its being shipped this upcoming saturday.

WRITING.TITLE: Just ordered a dvd and there was complications, now amazon says its being shipped this saturday?
WRITING.TEXT: I bought a dvd from Amazon sold by Amazon inc and they didnt ship it out today. I contacted them and they said there were some issues with my order but it will be shipped soon. when I checked the tracking page it said it was being shipped on the 25th this saturday but they dont even ship on stuff on saturdays. Also it says its supposed to arrive on the 23rd, so confusing.

WRITING.TITLE: Why do all of my active downloads and completed downloads disappear from time to time?
WRITING.TEXT: Why do all of my active downloads and completed downloads disappear from time to time and can I get them back?

WRITING.TITLE: Order dissapeared off of "Your Order" window but still hasnt been delivered Help please??
WRITING.TEXT: I have been expecting a dvd since the 15th of febuary and it was shipped on the 4th from Ontario to Abbotsford BC where I live. I contacted the seller and they said no worries I should receive my stuff soon .When I checck my orders today for some reason it disappeared of of My Orders but I havent even received it

Yeah, I highly suggest you purchase it if you haven't played it, it is worth it. it is Challenging, Action packed, great story/dialogue, and the actors are perfect for the characters. I bought mine off of amazon here
https://www.amazon.ca/Batman-Arkham-Asylum-Game-Year/dp/B003EV6NCQ/ref=sr_1_1?s=videogames ie=UTF8 qid=1487185273 sr=1-1 keywords=batman+arkham+asylum+game+of+the+year
There should have been more quests, more villains, and more story.
Arkham Asylum, Arkham City, Arkham Origins. And then the screwed everyone over and had to make Arkham Knight for Xbox One

WRITING.TITLE: I dont know about you guys but I think I like Arkham Asylum better than Arkham City
WRITING.TEXT: I ended up playing Arkham City first and I thought it was an incredible game, I found it to be lacking Missions and side missions though. I recently bought Arkham Asylum and I am about half way through the game, for some reason I am having a thrill going through this game. I know it has less of a combat system and gadgets than Arkham City but Arkham Asylum is way more menacing and in your face, has more quests, more villains and Dialogue. Just wondering is Arkham Asylum longer than City?

WRITING.TITLE: Are there any video playlists worth 5 Sb or more?
WRITING.TEXT: I was just wondering if there were any other video playlists worth 5 or more swagbucks?

WRITING.TITLE: Is there a website to show you all the specifications of every dvd?(Region, Subtitles, Language...)
WRITING.TEXT: I was just wondering if there is a website to search for dvds that tells you all the specifications of that specific dvd. I purchase movies off of amazon regularly and sometimes it doesnt say what region or if it has english subtitles, It would be a lot more easy to go to a website to search for it than contacting the sellers or purchasing it and being disappointed.
